text: Lapinlahti is a municipality in Northern Savonia, Finland. As of 31 March 2021, the municipality had a population of 9,331. Neighbouring municipalities are Iisalmi, Kuopio, Rautavaara, Siilinjärvi and Sonkajärvi. The neighboring municipality of Varpaisjärvi was merged with Lapinlahti on 1 January 2011. == Other websites == * Municipality of Lapinlahti – Official website Category:Municipalities of North Savo
title: Lapinlahti
